name: custom-rss
description: Scripts for fetching and cleaning RSS feeds with full-text content.

scripts.fetch:eurogamer:net: node fetch-eurogamer.js https://www.eurogamer.net/feed eurogamer_net_full.xml "Eurogamer.net RSS Feed" "Full article content from Eurogamer.net"
scripts.fetch:eurogamer:pl: node fetch-eurogamer.js https://www.eurogamer.pl/feed eurogamerpl.xml "Eurogamer.pl RSS Feed" "Full article content from Eurogamer.pl"
scripts.fetch:all: npm run fetch:gaming && npm run fetch:eurogamer:net && npm run fetch:eurogamer:pl
